Detailed Description

Moving Least Squares (MLS) class.

Using Moving Least Squares Approximation 2D and linear aproximation based on (Liu GR, Mesh Free Methods->Moving beyond the finite element method, CRC press, London, 2003, p79-87)

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MLS::MLS ( Initiation &  ini  ) 

constructor

  • declares the weighted moment matrix and assigns it to corresponding pointer

  • declares the ploynomial basis matrix and assigns it to corresponding pointer

  • declares the weights and assigns it to corresponding pointer

  • declares shape function matrix and assigns it to corresponding pointer

  • declares derivatives matrix (HAS NOT BEEN IMPLEMENTED!!!) and assigns it to corresponding pointer
